title: Is It Liberty If I Say No? - The Pharaoh Show (eGypt Radio)
description:
Broadcast 2nd July 2008 - on eGypt Radio

The question brought up today is the question of whether our society operates as it does, via consent, or via the use of group intimidation.
Also the question lingers... Who is the one doing the intimidation, if that is truly our modus.

Plus good music to go along with The Pharaoh\\\&#039;s apparent trivial banter.

For more archives, visit www.e-gypt.org
---------------

We\\\&#039;re now going to release The Pharaoh Show archives, strictly in torrent form. This is a completely intentional move to encourage piracy. ;)
For every torrent client we get running out there, and every peer we create, it adds another arrow to the already blood-drained \\\"Entertainment Industry\\\" which has suppressed real art for decades.
